sentences.sContent: We continue to conduct tests, but increasingly, we conduct long conversations with her, acutely aware that our creation will raise many ethical questions on the part of the public.
sentences.sContent_eng: We continue to conduct tests, but increasingly, we conduct long conversations with her, acutely aware that our creation will raise many ethical questions on the part of the public.
sentences.sCn: 我们将继续进行测试，但越来越多地，随着长时间的交谈，我们敏锐地意识到，我们的作品将在公众当中引起许多道德问题。

sentences.sContent: ...but nowhere more acutely than in the Amazon...

words.tran: 严重的，[医] 急性的；敏锐的；激烈的；尖声的
